value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla's border is just ahead.
It seems the darkness extends
beyond it...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, look!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|A village in Askr has disappeared.
Wiped from the world without so
much as a trace...$k$pWe believe the power of Embla's
royal family is necessary to close
off parts of the world like this.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pGo on...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It isn't your doing. And of course,
it's not the work of Zacharias either.
Of that, I'm certain.$k$pSo I'm hoping you will cooperate
with us to help solve this problem
before it gets worse.$k$pHelp us find the true source of
this disaster...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|In the name of the ties between
our two countries, we beg you,
Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Under normal circumstances,
I wouldn't care.$k$pBut the fact is that the same thing
is happening in Embla as well...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh no! That's terrible!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Yes. I have no choice. I will work
with you until we can find the cause.$k$p$Sbs150|
